metadata.title: CVE-2020-13776 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description: systemd through v245 mishandles numerical usernames such as ones composedof decimal digits or 0x followed by hex digits, as demonstrated by use ofroot privileges when privileges of the 0x0 user account were intended.NOTE: this issue exists because of an incomplete fix for CVE-2017-1000082.

criterions.comment: systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
systemd: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
